info.title: Proxies
info.description: The WebKnox proxies API lets you retrieve public proxies. We try to keep a list of fresh, unblocked, high responsive, and alive proxies. Public proxies come and go so it is not guaranteed that they are available at the point of retrieval. You can improve proxy delivery by sending feedback whether a proxy is blocked or dead.

parameters.name: maxResponseTime
parameters.description: The maximum response time of the proxy in seconds.

get.description: Get multiple proxies with one request.

parameters.name: batchSize
parameters.description: Number of proxies that should be returned with the request (between 1 and 100).

parameters.name: maxResponseTime
parameters.description: The maximum response time of the proxy in seconds.

get.description: Mark a certain proxy as blocked.

parameters.name: proxy
parameters.description: Mark a certain proxy as blocked. This will help improving proxy delivery.

get.description: Mark a certain proxy as dead.

parameters.name: proxy
parameters.description: Mark the proxy as dead. This will help improving proxy delivery.

get.description: Retrieve a Web page using a proxy.

parameters.name: url
parameters.description: The URL of the Web page you want to retrieve.
